input_args.passage: "Serena Williams | Biography, Titles, & Facts | Serena Williams is an American tennis player who revolutionized women's tennis with her powerful style of play and who won more Grand Slam singles titles ..."
input_args.claim: 'Firstly, we note from the context that Serena Williams has won 23 Grand Slam singles titles, 14 Grand Slam doubles titles, and three doubles gold medals at the Olympics.'
